name: Newbie Hill
description: Small hill with a large tree, with distant vistas of fields, mountains on the horizon and a small village in a nearby vale.

name: Wensleyvale Village
description: Small village fortified with an old wooden palisade.

name: Wensleyvale Forest
description: Lush forest, just beyond the Wensleyvale creek. Mostly safe, but still be careful.
